cause.description:
Millions of children all over the world are being abused in many different ways.
Sexual, verbal, physical and psychological abuse are just a few. This isn't something new and it certainly isn't controlled.
We, as a humane population, need to put an end to this once and for all.
1. Children deserve a happy and carefree childhood
2. People who abuse children should be dealt with harshly
3. Abuse in childhood will lead to an unhealthy adulthood.
cause.mission: make people more aware of the trauma and fear that children are out through as a result of Cruelty/Sexual Assault/Verbal or Physical Abuse. We want to stop it and can with your help.
